name: Soldier Simon
description:
If you played "Simon Says", then this game is probably for you!

"Soldier Simon" is a fast-paced, strategy, action, zombie game...Enjoy it!

Instructions:

Follow the (Yellow) Pattern on the Zombie and Press the Correct Key to get a point and to keep going, but be careful there's a 30 second timer... Try to get a high score!

Good Luck Soldier!
